title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 162.1 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 162.1 - General

State Regulations

Subdivision 9 of section
10
of the Highway

Law gives the power and duty of the Commissioner of Transportation to prescribe
rules and regulations not inconsistent with law, fixing the duties of county
and town superintendents in respect to all highways and bridges and determining
the method of the construction, improvement or maintenance of such highways and
bridges. Such subdivision also requires that such rules and regulations shall, before taking effect, be printed and transmitted to the highway officers
affected thereby. It is the intent of this Part to provide a procedure whereby
county and town superintendents may perform their duties in certain instances
with the assistance of the Department of Transportation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
162.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
